name: Simplifai Labs Holding LTD
description: Developer of a marketing platform designed to target micro-moments that matter by combining image, sentiment and emotional recognition. The company's platform allows brands to reduce their digital marketing wastage, enabling them to increase brand safety and communication relevancy by manifolds.
